name: I am Fearfully & Wonderfully Made {Scripted Tee}
description: Be reminded of your true beauty and worth with our hand scripted tee. Comfy, flowy fit. Fits true to size.

name: WM Trucker/Surfer Girl Hat
description:
This trucker-style hat is great on the beach or for any day you don't want to deal with fixing your hair.

Features hot pink bill and mesh back.  Wonderfully Made logo in gray and teal on the front.  Polyester foam front, 4" structured crown, rounded bill, plastic snap closure. One size fits all.

name: Exercise Affirmation Mat {I Am Wonderfully Made}
description:
Beautiful turquoise all purpose exercise mat with the affirmation "I am wonderfully made" inspired by Psalm 139. 

Made to make you happy and inspire a smile on the inside. Your Affirmat positively affects you and those practicing around you. No slipping. No sliding. 

Eco pvc blended with Jute fiber to create a non slip surface. Each mat is made with Jute fiber which creates a non slip base for all your awesome moves. 

Free Shipping is provided for this item!

name: Wonderfully Made Vneck Tee
description:
Features our logo on the lower left front of the tee.

Unbelievably comfy tee!

An Alternative Apparel tee made of unbelievably soft and sustainable Eco-Heather, this best-selling tee features a v-neck and blind stitching on sleeves and hem. Part of our eco-friendly Alternative Earth collection. Unisex regular fit.

name: WM Hoodie Sweatshirt
description:
Limited quantities currently available only in size Large.  

DESCRIPTION
Features our WM logo on the left front.

FEATURES
Alternative Apparel unisex-sized women's hoodie. A knockout when it comes to style and comfort, this sweatshirt features drawstring ties, a kangaroo front pocket and an antiqued nickel zipper. Made of sustainable Eco-Fleece and part of the eco-friendly Alternative Earth collection. 

SIZING
Unisex, regular fit. Women typically buy a size smaller than usual.

name: Father's Love Letter {Postcards: Set of 25}
description:
25 4x6 postcards with the "Father's Love Letter." Offering these to you at cost in hopes you will carry them with you and share them with girls in your life! 

For multiple sets of 25, just change the quantity.

name: WM Decal
description:
Aqua-teal and white Wonderfully Made decal. 

Great for your car, laptop or bathroom mirror. 

5 x 3.5 inches.

Spread the word that we are each fearfully and wonderfully made.

name: Guard Your Heart Necklace
description:
"Above everything else guard your heart, because from it flow the springs of life."  Proverbs 4:23

The newest piece in the wmBoutique jewelry collection, the Guard Your Heart Necklace features a 1" antiqued brass disc hand-stamped with the words "Guard Your Heart" and a matching 1 3/4" matching key.

Both charms hang from a 24" brass chain of medium thickness with a lobster clasp at the top.

The necklace is light weight in spite of its metal components.

Ships in stamped kraft jewelry box - ready for a gift or to enjoy yourself. Proceeds support the mission and work of Wonderfully Made.

name: Rubies & Pearls | Soldered Glass Pendant
description:
This pendant has "know your value" beautifully written on the front.

The back contains one of our favorite scriptures and reads: "Her value is above rubies and pearls" Proverbs 31:10

It is sandwiched between two pieces of glass and soldered with lead free silver bearing solder. 

The piece measures 1" X 1.5" (approx. 2.5cm X 3.8cm) and includes a 24" ball chain.

Each soldered glass pendant is individually hand made by our designer, so your piece may vary slightly from the one pictured. Because the solder we use contains sterling silver, it will tarnish and darken over time. Use a silver polish or polishing cloth to bring back its original shine.

Ships in stamped kraft jewelry box - ready for a gift or to enjoy yourself. Proceeds support the mission and work of Wonderfully Made.

name: Fearfully and Wonderfully Made | Soldered Pendant
description:
Our unique, hand-made necklace features our signature verse taken from Psalm 139, serving as a beautiful reminder that we are each fearfully and wonderfully made by God.

The glass pendant measures 1/2" X 2 1/2" and is securely soldered but is not waterproof. The pendant includes a 24" ball chain accented by a stunning faux-pearl.

Ships in stamped kraft jewelry box - ready for a gift or to enjoy yourself. Proceeds support the mission and work of Wonderfully Made.

name: Wings like Eagles | Soldered Glass Pendant
description:
"But those who wait on the LORD shall renew their strength, they shall mount up with wings like eagles, they shall run and not be weary, they shall walk and not faint." Isaiah 40:31

What does it mean to "wait on the LORD"? There are three Hebrew words that are translated wait. One means to be silent before God. Another implies dependence and expectation. The other is the concept of a servant and his master...an attitude of readiness and obedience. 

So in today's world where we run and, in fact, are weary, where we walk and do faint, and the wings of our souls are anything but soaring, perhaps if we "wait" upon the LORD...if we are silent before Him in utter dependence and expectation with an attitude of readiness and obedience...then we will be able to receive this promise from God. 

This beautiful pendant is a reminder of that promise. The front is pretty tiffany blue and red paper. The back contains Isaiah 40:31. The two images are sandwiched between two pieces of glass and soldered with lead free silvergleem solder. It is securely sealed but is not waterproof. The wing charm measures 1 1/4" X 1/2" and really sets this piece off. 

The piece measures .5" X 2.5" and includes a 24" ball chain.

Each soldered glass pendant is individually hand made, so your piece may vary slightly from the one pictured.

Ships in stamped kraft jewelry box - ready for a gift or to enjoy yourself. Proceeds support the mission and work of Wonderfully Made.

name: I Am Free | Soldered Glass Pendant
description:
This is a hand drawn birdcage on cream heavy weight paper.

The back contains one of our favorite scriptures and reads: "Then you will know the truth and the truth will set you free." John 8:32

The little birdie has been freed and floats outside the cage on a beaded dangle.

It is sandwiched between two pieces of glass and soldered with lead free silver bearing solder. 

The piece measures 1" X 1.5" (approx. 2.5cm X 3.8cm) and includes a 24" ball chain.

Each soldered glass pendant is individually hand made by our designer, so your piece may vary slightly from the one pictured. Because the solder we use contains sterling silver, it will tarnish and darken over time. Use a silver polish or polishing cloth to bring back its original shine.

Ships in stamped kraft jewelry box - ready for a gift or to enjoy yourself. Proceeds support the mission and work of Wonderfully Made.

name: WM Cuff
description:
Be reminded daily of your true value and beauty!

Wonderfully Made cuff perfectly hammered to allow shine!

Cuff is skin safe aluminum 1/4" wide.

name: Wonderfully Made: Becoming Who You Are in Christ
description:
By Allie Marie Smith and the Wonderfully Made Team

Six Bible study sessions for personal or small group study.

Discover your true identity, and know your value…
Hidden deep within the heart of every woman lies a series of lingering questions:
Am I worthy?
Am I enough?
Do you think I’m beautiful?
Am I of value…to my friends, to my family, and to the world?

Women of every age and girls have a hard time finding and believing their value. From girlhood to womanhood, we are on a quest to have these questions answered with a resounding "yes!" The desire to be found worthy, loved, beautiful, and valuable is an insatiable search for significance; a hunger in our souls that fuels every dream, decision, and relationship.

Becoming Who You Are in Christ guides girls and women of all ages on a journey to discover their true identity and worth as beloved daughters of God.
Discover the source of their true value and worth.
Cultivate true confidence that comes from God, not self.
Move from insecurity to radiance and joy.
Ditch the trap of perfectionism, and thrive in freedom and grace.
Walk in their true identity, and reflect Christ to a lost and hurting world.


Includes personal stories, discussion and journaling questions, challenges, and memory verses.

Lesson 1: Discovering Your Value
Lesson 2: Cultivating Righteous Self-Confidence
Lesson 3: Making Peace With Your Personality
Lesson 4: Goodbye, Insecurity
Lesson 5: Clothed in Strength and Dignity
Lesson 6: Walking in Your True Value

No "leader" is required, just a facilitator who makes sure everyone is included in discussion.

Each woman needs her own copy of this book.

name: Wonderfully Made: Healthy Eating & Abundant Living {New Edition}
description:
by Allie Marie Smith and Judy Wardell Halliday

*This is the republished edition of the original book "HEAL: Healthy Eating  & Abundant Living."

Six Bible study sessions for personal or small group study.

Explore healthy eating, and discover your true identity in Christ!

Many girls and women struggle with an unhealthy body image and an unhealthy relationship with food. They’re desperate for healing.

We’re bombarded with messages about being thin and having a perfect body. We’re obsessed with what we put in our mouths and the number on the scale. Our worth seems to be based on outside appearances. We try to control our lives by controlling what we eat—either too much or too little. We feel empty, lifeless, stuck, and desperate for more.

There’s hope! You are loved. And you can be healed.

In Healthy Eating & Abundant Living, you’ll discover how to stop counting calories and start living—living through your relationship with God, not food.

This study gives you:
A lifestyle plan—learn how to be more healthy, fit, and aware, and gain motivation to rise above the strongholds of food and body image.
An exploration of Psalm 139—allow your body, mind, and spirit to be renewed through God.
Encouragement—as you take bold, new steps to work through your own personal struggles and be healed from the inside out.


Become the woman God designed you to be. Your journey starts here.

Lesson 1: You Are Wonderfully Made
Lesson 2: The HEAL Basics
Lesson 3: Healing Your Hunger
Lesson 4: Body Beautiful
Lesson 5: An Aisle of Grace
Lesson 6: Abundant Living

No "leader" is required, just a facilitator who makes sure everyone is included in discussion.

Each woman needs her own copy of this book.

name: Wonderfully Made Bible Study Combo
description:
Includes both books in the Wonderfully Made Bible study series.

Wonderfully Made: Healthy Eating & Abundant Living
Wonderfully Made: Becoming Who You Are in Christ

name: KNOW YOUR VALUE | 8x10 Print
description:
Our eye-catching "Know Your Value" 8x10 print is lovely for your bedroom, dorm room, apartment or for one of your "besties" or a little girl you love! 

High quality printing on cardstock paper. Looks great in a frame or by itself. 

100% profits support Wonderfully Made's programs and resources!
